abstract: Justice Dept report finds administrators of Hinds County Adult Detention Center in Raymond, Miss, and the Jackson City Detention Center in Jackson, Miss, routinely violate rights of inmates; department orders sweeping changes within seven weeks.
lead_paragraph: The review found that conditions at the Hinds County Adult Detention Center in Raymond and the Jackson City Detention Center in Jackson violated the constitutional rights of prisoners.

headline.main: Justice Dept. Faults Two Mississippi Jails
headline.print_headline: Justice Dept. Faults Two Mississippi Jails

snippet: The review found that conditions at the Hinds County Adult Detention Center in Raymond and the Jackson City Detention Center in Jackson violated the constitutional rights of prisoners.
